channel.title: CVE Feed for Hitachi Vantara -- Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics

item.title: CVE-2024-28981|2024-09-12T13:18:16.563Z -- hitachi%20vantara -- pentaho%20data%20integration%20%26%20analytics
item.description: Hitachi Vantara Pentaho Data Integration & Analytics versions before 10.1.0.0 and 9.3.0.8, including 8.3.x, discloses database passwords when searching metadata injectable fields.
